Mirror of False Impressions

miscellaneous (lvl 6)

item id [id]: 340
leadership [ldr-n]: -20
(false-army [allunitslooklikebearertoscouts])

Requires 25A to forge (A4)

This mirror makes everyone in the entire army look the same. This is very useful to camouflage important monsters from enemy eyes, but it also makes commanding the army difficult because anyone can pretend to be the commander.
